outcome_statement: Compelling value proposition is offered to our customers
Our brand is immediately recognized and revered
Talent fluidly moves and aligns in real time to the greatest value creating priorities
The discipline and fortitude to change exists throughout the organization
Our employees across the enterprise work together as a strong and cohesive team
Each of our employees achieve their career aspirations
The perspectives of individual employees are respected and valued
Every employee feels they are part of something extraordinary
Every employee feels their well-being is important to the company
Employees always get the right things done at the right time in the right way
Leaders across the company are admired and respected
The most informed, intelligent and complete insights are created
Data is complete and accurate
Decsions are properly vetted
Employees closest to the point of business impact are empowered to make decisions
Easy for customers to do business with us
An unbelievable level of service is delivered to every customer
Each customer feels they are most important to Molex
Trust with customers
Every employee is liberated to see what can be possible
Encouraged to be curious
Resources are aligned & focused on the needs and priorities of the business
Appropriate funding is always available to support the business
The way we work is continually optimized
Partners help to create the most compelling products
Each partner works as a seamless and natural extension of the other and Molex
Design process is effectively performed
We lead in developing and applying new technologies to products
Our digital assets are effectively leveraged
We accurately foresee our customer's needs before they know they have them
Product development capabilities are eagerly embraced and adopted by the organization
Molex, our customers and partners are entwined together
We ignite bold innovations with our customers to see what hasn’t been seen before
The most accurate prototypes are rapidly created and validated
The freshest insights drive unexpected design breakthroughs
Our workforce is the envy of the industry and competition
The most beneficial technology solutions are effectively developed
Stakeholders are awestruck with value of our technology products and platform
Technology capabilities are effectively leveraged and adopted by the business
